Events.Text: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also ask the assistant about the weather.  [instruction 1 of 6]
This is Angela! What's your name?
Hello
Hello, how can I help?
I need to set up a meeting with John. He's been avoiding me for 2 weeks.
what day
What day did you have in mind for the meeting?
Sooner is better, see if I can get in at 8 am Wednesday.
Please have some smalltalk with the AI Assistant at some point in this dialogue. [instruction 2 of 6]
end meeting
When do you expect the meeting to wrap up?
Not til 10 or so, we have a lot to hash out.

Item.Message: Your meeting has been successfuly scheduled.

PrimaryItem.Message: Your meeting has been successfuly scheduled.

Events.Text: Fantastic, your meeting with John has been successfully scheduled for Sunday, 8 am-10 am.
Oh no. That won't do. I do not wake up before noon on weekends.
If you haven't yet, it's time to change topic. You can also go back and forth between topics. [instruction 3 of 6]

PrimaryItem.Message: Your meeting has been successfuly scheduled.

PrimaryItem.Message: That person has a conflicting meeting at that time. Try another meeting time.

Events.Text:
Unfortunately John is not able to make Wednesday @ 8 am.
Would you like to try scheduling the meeting for a different day or time?
Yeah, just do the sunday meeting. Also, give me the weather for Sunday as well.

Keep going until you've covered all the topics ('checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting'). The conversation should continue at least until the last instruction is given. [instruction 5 of 6]

PrimaryItem.Message: That person has a conflicting meeting at that time. Try another meeting time.

Events.Text: what city

PrimaryItem.Message: That person has a conflicting meeting at that time. Try another meeting time.

Events.Text: For what location would you like the weather forecast?
Chicago

PrimaryItem.Message: That person has a conflicting meeting at that time. Try another meeting time.

Events.Text: sunny
It will be Sunny all day on Sunday in Chicago, with temperatures of around 16 degrees celsius.
I guess that'll make waking up early a little better. Hey where's my car. Check on ride ID 802 for me.

Ok, once you've touched on all the topics ('checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting') and engaged in some smalltalk, you can bring the conversation to a natural close. [instruction 6 of 6]

Scenario.UserTask:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: Angela

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Check your ride's status (e.g. ride id 802)
- Get walking/driving/transit directions (e.g. from 'Airport' to 'University') 
- Schedule a meeting
- Checking the weather forecast in different Cities (e.g. New York City or Los Angeles)
Scenario.WizardTask: Follow the flow charts and help the user.

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
